column1: * 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Rosfrith Murray.
* 1970 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to W.A.R. Hadley.
* 1993 - Morgoths Ring is published in the US.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)) is released on DVD.
* 2012 - The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey is released in India and North America.
